name: mdbrowse
description: A markdown-first browser that prioritizes markdown content

scripts.start: bun run build:toolbar && MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=14.0 electrobun build && electrobun dev
scripts.build: bun run build:toolbar && MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=14.0 electrobun build --env=stable
scripts.build:stable: bun run build:toolbar && MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=14.0 electrobun build --env=stable
scripts.test: bun run scripts/turndown.test.ts && bun run scripts/turndown-comparison.test.ts
